name: MultiWordConsumer
description: DO NOT USE THIS CODE IN PRODUCTION. This is an example contract.

eventDecorators.name: ChainlinkCancelled
eventDecorators.description: To call when there is consensus on final result.

eventDecorators.name: ChainlinkFulfilled
eventDecorators.description: To call when there is consensus on final result.

eventDecorators.name: ChainlinkRequested
eventDecorators.description: To call when there is consensus on final result.

eventDecorators.name: RequestMultipleFulfilled
eventDecorators.description: To call when there is consensus on final result.

functionDecorators.name: fulfillMultipleParameters
functionDecorators.description: Fulfillment function for multiple parameters in a single request. This is called by the oracle. recordChainlinkFulfillment must be used.

functionDecorators.name: requestMultipleParameters
functionDecorators.description: Request mutiple parameters from the oracle in a single transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: specId
parameterDecorators.description: bytes32 representation of the jobId in the Oracle.

parameterDecorators.name: payment
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 cost of request in LINK (JUELS).
